entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
